page.title: 08READING FOR PLEASURE
page.content:
through a conker and thread it on string. Find someone else with a conker and take turns at hitting each others conker.
Reading for pleasure "I like to spend my spare time readung and on 23rd May I took part in a Book Discussion Day at the Teachers Centre. People from various schools in the area had been chosen to take part. Before the book day we all read ll books. Five were novels and six were picture books. We discussed each book in turn. My favourite picture book was "Willie the Wimp". I liked the story because it was comical and the pictures were bright. The novel I liked best was "The Demon Headmaster". He hynotizes his pupils to do what he wants. The story is about a group of pupils who cannot be hynotized and
